dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-scandir
dependencies.description: scandir, a better directory iterator and faster os.walk().

dependent_to.name: py-nara-wpe
dependent_to.description:
Background noise and signal reverberation due to reflections in an
enclosure are the two main impairments in acoustic signal processing and
far-field speech recognition. This work addresses signal dereverberation
techniques based on WPE for speech recognition and other far-field
applications. WPE is a compelling algorithm to blindly dereverberate
acoustic signals based on long-term linear prediction.

dependent_to.name: py-poetry
dependent_to.description: Python dependency management and packaging made easy.

dependent_to.name: py-flatten-dict
dependent_to.description:
A flexible utility for flattening and unflattening dict-lik objects in
Python

dependent_to.name: py-pytest
dependent_to.description: pytest: simple powerful testing with Python.

dependent_to.name: py-ipython
dependent_to.description:
IPython provides a rich toolkit to help you make the most out of using
Python interactively.

dependent_to.name: py-azure-datalake-store
dependent_to.description: Azure Data Lake Store Filesystem Client Library for Python.

dependent_to.name: py-msal-extensions
dependent_to.description:
The Microsoft Authentication Extensions for Python offers secure
mechanisms for client applications to perform cross-platform token cache
serialization and persistence. It gives additional support to the
Microsoft Authentication Library for Python (MSAL).

dependent_to.name: py-virtualenv
dependent_to.description: virtualenv is a tool to create isolated Python environments.

dependent_to.name: py-wxpython
dependent_to.description: Cross platform GUI toolkit for Python.
